tool_description: Provides users with all relevant information regarding weapons in Valorant
title: Valorant Weapons

api_list.name: Weapon Classes
api_list.description: Returns a list of all weapons classes (along with their respective weapons) that are currently in Valorant.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com/{weapon_class_name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Weapon
api_list.description: Deletes a specified weapon from a class.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com/weapon/{weapon_name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create Weapon Class
api_list.description: Creates a new weapon class with optional weapon objects
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com/weapon-class"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create Weapon
api_list.description: Creates a new weapon along with its stats to add to a weapon class. The weapon class that you are adding the weapon to must be added before making this call.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com/{weapon_class_name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update Weapon Class Name
api_list.description: Updates the specified weapon class name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com/{weapon_class_name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "valorant-weapons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.put(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create Weapon Class
api_list.description: Creates a new weapon class with optional weapon objects

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
